name: WUFO
description:
Navigate your ship 🛸 and recover Wi-Fi while dodging obstacles and fighting space enemies in the 4 worlds and 8 available bosses. You can also play together with a friend in 2D cooperative multiplayer!

Help! They are chasing us. If our Wi-Fi is stolen, we are lost.

I hope you arrive in time to help us, because I don't think they come in peace ...

Seriously, we must not let our Wi-Fi be stolen...!
